rddesign.RDD.continuity_test#

Performs a joint Wald Test using exogenous covariates to test for discontinuities in the distribution of the running variable or the no-treatment potential outcome following Lee and Lemieux[1].

Parameters#

modelstr, optional

Method used to fit the model. Should be one of "local linear" or "polynomial"

residualizeboolean, optional

Indicator for whether to residualize each placebo outcome (exogenous covariate) using the other exogenous covariates before estimation. Default is True.

kwargsvaries, optional

All other keyword arguments are passed into

  • rddesign.RDD.fit

Returns#

resultHTestResult

The optimization result represented as an object. Resembles statsmodels result object. Important attributes are:

  • params, which stores the estimated treatment effect for each placebo outcome as a pd.Series

  • bse, which stores the standard errors for the treatment effect for each placebo outcome as a pd.Series

  • waldstat, which stores the standardized \(\chi^{2}\) test statistic for the treatment effect for each placebo outcome

  • pvalue, which stores the joint pvalue under the alternative hypothesis \(\theta_{0}^{(1)}, \dots, \theta_{0}^{(p)} \neq 0\)

  • summary(), which summarizes the results

Notes#

For each unique exogenous variable (\(x_{p} \in X\)), we estimate the equation,

\[x_{p} = \alpha_{l} + \theta_{0} A + f(D − c) + \epsilon\]

For treatment assignment \(A = 1(D > c)\), running variable \(D\), placebo outcome \(x_{p}\), and model choice \(f(D - c)\). We then compute the wald test statistic for each faux treatment effect,

\[W_{p} = \frac{\hat{\theta_{0}}^{2}}{\hat{\sigma}^{2}}\]

Finally, the joint pvalue is calculated by using a \(\chi^{2}\) test on the sum of the wald statistics \(W_{1} + \dots + W_{p}\).

When model = 'local linear' is chosen, \(f(D - c) = \beta_{\ell} (D - c) + (\beta_{r} − \beta_{\ell}) A (D − c)\). When model = 'polynomial' is chosen, \(f(D - c) = \beta_{\ell} (D - c) + (\beta_{r} − \beta_{\ell}) A (D − c) + \dots + \beta_{\ell} (D - c)^{k} + (\beta_{r} − \beta_{\ell}) A (D − c)^{k}\).

Bandwidth, polynomial order, and optimization algorithms, can be controlled by passing keyword arguments.

References#

[1]

David S Lee and Thomas Lemieux. Regression discontinuity designs in economics. Journal of economic literature, 48(2):281–355, 2010.

Examples#

Perform continuity hypthesis test using local linear regression with automatic bandwidth selection for each placebo outcome.

>>> y, d, x, a = generate_sample_data()
>>> c = 0
>>> model = RDD(outcome = y, runv = d, cutoff = c,
>>>             exog = x)
>>> res = model.continuity_test(model = 'local linear')
>>> res.summary()
                                 Local linear Continuity Wald Test
====================================================================================================
Model:                              local linear    Run. Variable:                              None
Covariance Type:       Heteroskedasticity-robust    No. Observations:                            400
Joint pvalue:                              0.307
====================================================================================================
Dep. Variable              Treatment ...        coef     std err    waldstat       order   bandwidth
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
0                                              0.173       0.117       2.177        None       9.938
1                                             -0.056       0.130       0.184        None       9.938
====================================================================================================

Perform the same test, but fix the bandwidth used in estimation:

>>> res = model.continuity_test(model = 'local linear',
>>>       bandwidth = 5)
>>> res.summary()
                                 Local linear Continuity Wald Test
====================================================================================================
Model:                              local linear    Run. Variable:                              None
Covariance Type:       Heteroskedasticity-robust    No. Observations:                            400
Joint pvalue:                              0.533
====================================================================================================
Dep. Variable              Treatment ...        coef     std err    waldstat       order   bandwidth
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
0                                              0.155       0.160       0.940        None       5.000
1                                             -0.099       0.174       0.319        None       5.000
====================================================================================================

Perform continuity hypthesis test using polynomial regression, not residualizing the placebo outcomes and fixing the polynomial order.

>>> res = model.continuity_test(model = 'polynomial',
>>>       order = 2, residulaize = False)
>>> res.summary()
                                  Polynomial Continuity Wald Test
====================================================================================================
Model:                                polynomial    Run. Variable:                              None
Covariance Type:       Heteroskedasticity-robust    No. Observations:                            400
Joint pvalue:                              0.777
====================================================================================================
Dep. Variable              Treatment ...        coef     std err    waldstat       order   bandwidth
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
0                                              0.115       0.171       0.449           2        None
1                                              0.044       0.188       0.054           2        None
====================================================================================================
